Dear All, 
Im looking for information on Kajihei, the son/student of Jirita=
ro Naokatsu. 
He seems to have a mixed reputation in that he was a highly s=
killed smith but specilaised in making counterfeit blades of top Koto and S=
hinto smiths. 
Trying to work out whether he was a victim of the times tryi=
ng to survive the downturn in demand for swords or just a dishonest but hig=
hly skilled crook. 
All information/ leads gratefully received. 
thanks
